comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build ID: 20110615151330

Steps to reproduce:

The source code of a mail contains quotation marks in the header entrys
'from' or 'to'.
e.g.:
From: "Mustermann, Max" <mustermann@domain.com>
or
To: "Mustermann, Max" <mustermann@domain.com>



Actual results:

In message list the sender or recipient will be displayed with quotation marks.
e.g.:
"Mustermann, Max"



Expected results:

The sender or recipient shold be displayed as:
Mustermann, Max
without quotation marks 

In the mail preview the sender will be already displayed correctly.
comments.creator: mtb@trash-mail.com
